    • Method Detail

      • createShape

        public static java.awt.geom.Path2D createShape(MPointDouble[] points)
        Creates a Path2D geometric object from a set of points. Used for creating MArea objects. Points for the path need to be given in counter clockwise order.
        Parameters:
        points - set of points
        Returns:
        Path2D object.

      • fits

        public static boolean fits(java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D o1,
                           java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D o2)
        Takes two rectangles and check if the first fits into the second
        Parameters:
        o1 - rectangle to be contained
        o2 - rectangle to be the container
        Returns:
        true if o1 fits into o2, false otherwise
        See Also:
        Rectangle2D

      • fitsRotated

        public static boolean fitsRotated(java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D o1,
                                  java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D o2)
        Takes two rectangles and check if the rotation of the first (90º) fits into the other
        Parameters:
        o1 - rectangle to be rotated 90º and checked
        o2 - rectangle container
        Returns:
        true if a 90º rotation of the first fits into the second, false otherwise
        See Also:
        Rectangle2D

      • equalDimension

        public static boolean equalDimension(java.awt.Rectangle o1,
                                     java.awt.Rectangle o2)
        Takes two rectangles and check if they have the same dimensions
        Parameters:
        o1 - first rectangle to check
        o2 - second rectangle to check
        Returns:
        true if both rectangles have the same dimensions, false otherwise
        See Also:
        Rectangle

      • drawMAreasToFile

        public static void drawMAreasToFile(java.util.ArrayList<MArea> pieces,
                                    java.awt.Dimension viewPortDimension,
                                    java.awt.Dimension binDimension,
                                    java.lang.String name)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Draws a list of pieces taking into account the bin dimension and the desired viewport dimension
        Parameters:
        pieces - pieces to be drawn
        viewPortDimension - viewport Dimension
        binDimension - bin real Dimension
        name - name of the file to be drawn
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a problem occurs during the creation of the file
        See Also:
        Dimension, IOException
